page.title:
Act of 1998
Act of 1998

Act of 1998 Mandated:
Act of 1998
Mandated:
page.normal_text:
That States promote continuous improvement in vocational and technical education to ensure that students acquire the skills and knowledge they need to meet the challenging academic standards and industry-recognized skill standards to prepare for post-secondary education, further learning and a wide range of opportunities in high-skill, high-wage careers.
That States promote continuous improvement
in vocational and technical education to
ensure that students acquire the skills and
knowledge they need to meet the challenging
academic standards and industry-recognized
skill standards to prepare for post-secondary
education, further learning and a wide range
of opportunities in high-skill, high-wage
careers.

Act of 1998
Act of 1998
page.normal_text:
Mandated:
Mandated:

That the focus of Federal investment would be in programs that:
That the focus of Federal
investment would be in programs
that:

page.enlisting:
Support the alignment of vocational and technical education with state and local efforts to reform secondary schools and improve post-secondary education. Promote the integration of academic and vocational education. Facilitate challenging academic, vocational and technical standards for students. Offer assistance to students in understanding all aspect of an industry.

technical education with state and local

improve post-secondary education.

vocational education.

understanding all aspect of an industry.

page.title:
How?
How?
page.normal_text:
States and local programs will report annually the performance of career and technical education students by the collection of data disaggregated by special populations and by subgroups under NCLB.
States and local programs will
report annually the performance of
career and technical education
students by the collection of data
disaggregated by special
populations and by subgroups
under NCLB.

page.title:
How?
How?
page.normal_text:
Improvement Plans - state and local programs that fail to meet at least 90% of any adjusted level of performance for any core performance indicator will develop a program improvement plan immediately following the year that it failed to meet its target.
Improvement Plans - state and
local programs that fail to meet
at least 90% of any adjusted
level of performance for any
core performance indicator will
develop a program
improvement plan immediately
following the year that it failed
to meet its target.

page.title:
Supplementary Services
Supplementary Services
page.normal_text:
Special Populations may need supplementary services to assist them in becoming successful in their chosen career and technical education program and in the core performance indicators. These services may include:
Special Populations may need
supplementary services to assist them in
becoming successful in their chosen
career and technical education program
and in the core performance indicators.
These services may include:

1. Curriculum Modification 2. Equipment Modification 3. Instructional Modification 4. Supportive Personnel 5. Instructional Aids and Devices
1. Curriculum Modification
2. Equipment Modification
3. Instructional Modification
4. Supportive Personnel
5. Instructional Aids and Devices
